wikipedia_page.main: Samuel "Sam" Jones  (born 1866) was a Welsh international footballer. He was part of the Wales national football team between 1887 and 1890, playing 2 matches. He played his first match on 12 March 1887 against Ireland and his last match on 22 March 1890 against Scotland.

response: * Samuel Jones (English politician) (1610–1673), English politician, House of Commons, 1656 and 1660
* Samuel Jones-Loyd, 1st Baron Overstone (1796–1883), British banker and politician

* Samuel Jones (Massachusetts politician) (1778–1862), Massachusetts state representative
* Samuel Jones (academy tutor) (1681/2–1719), English Dissenter and educator

* Samuel Jones (composer) (born 1935), American composer and conductor
* Samuel Jones (Confederate Army officer) (1819–1887), general in the Confederate States Army
